SELECT a.id, a.type, a.change_amount changeAmount, FORMAT(a.total_price,2) totalPrice, a.bill_no billNo, CONVERT (a.bill_time, CHAR) billTime, a.hands_person_id hansPersonId, a.remark, s.supplier supplierName FROM erp_accounthead a JOIN erp_supplier s ON a.organ_id = s.id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId}
AND a.bill_no LIKE '%${billNo}%'
AND a.bill_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= a.bill_time
ORDER BY a.bill_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.type payType, a.organ_id organId, a.hands_person_id handsPersonId, CONVERT(a.change_amount, decimal(24, 2)) changeAmount, CONVERT(a.total_price, decimal(24, 2)) totalPrice, a.account_id accountId, a.bill_no billNo, CONVERT (a.bill_time, char) billTime, a.remark FROM erp_accounthead a WHERE a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.bill_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT a.id, a.in_out_item_id initemId, CONVERT(a.each_amount , decimal(24, 2)) initemMoney, a.remark FROM erp_accountitem a WHERE a.header_id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, (CASE a.type WHEN 2 THEN '收入' WHEN 3 THEN '收款' WHEN 6 THEN '收预付款' END) payType, FORMAT(a.change_amount, 2) changeAmount, FORMAT(a.total_price, 2) totalPrice, a.bill_no billNo, CONVERT (a.bill_time, CHAR) billTime, a.hands_person_id hansPersonId, a.remark, s.supplier supplierName, t.`name` accountName FROM erp_accounthead a JOIN erp_supplier s ON a.organ_id = s.id JOIN erp_account t ON a.account_id = t.id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId} AND a.id = #{id} AND a.type IN (2,3,6) ORDER BY a.bill_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT a.id, FORMAT(a.each_amount,2) eachAmount, a.remark, c.`name` inoutitemName FROM erp_accountitem a JOIN erp_account b ON a.account_id = b.id JOIN erp_inoutitem c ON a.in_out_item_id = c.id WHERE a.header_id = #{id} AND a.delete_flag = 0
